title: WHO Air Quality Guidelines
description: A quick, practical guide to WHO Air Quality Guidelines.

hook.text: In 2021, the WHO tightened its air quality guidelines for the first time in 16 years.

buildup.text: The new PM2.5 limit dropped from 10 to 5 micrograms per cubic meter â€” half the old standard.

discovery.text: Almost no country on Earth currently meets the new guideline. Most are far above it.

twist.text: The guidelines aren't legally binding. Countries can ignore them without consequence.

climax.text: But they set the scientific benchmark â€” the number governments are judged against.

punchline.text: Science set the bar. The world hasn't reached it yet.
